title: BOTW Compendium
description: A Web application which provides an easy to use interface for searching through and browsing all materials and items found in a popular Nintendo video game with the help of a third party API

title: Puzzled
description: A full CRUD application using RESTful routing which allows for keeping track of completed puzzles and exchanging them with others in the community

title: Untangle
description: A full CRUD SPA (Single Page Application) for keeping track of personal CBT journal entries as well as sharing them with your therapist

title: Tech Talk
description: A full CRUD application for creating and sharing blog posts related to the tech industry.
